title: Urban Migration and Environmental Impact
author: J. Smith
source: Journal of Urban Studies – University of Amsterdam
preview: The study reveals that urban migration has contributed to a 15% rise in carbon emissions in rapidly growing metropolitan areas between 2015 and 2022.

title: Sustainable Cities
author: L. Chen
preview: Chen proposes a framework for urban sustainability, but provides limited data for post-2020 developments, making further validation necessary.

title: Migration Patterns in Europe
author: A. Rossi
preview: The paper presents a longitudinal analysis of internal EU migration trends, showing a consistent population shift from rural to urban zones in over 12 countries.

title: Socioeconomic Drivers of Urbanization
author: K. Patel
preview: The author discusses potential economic motives behind urban growth but lacks supporting data and peer-reviewed references.

title: The Future of Urban Living
author: M. Dubois
preview: Dubois argues that future urban planning must prioritize equity and energy efficiency, supported by case studies from Amsterdam and Singapore.
